# windowDidMiniaturize(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the window has been minimized.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func windowDidMiniaturize(_ notification: Notification)
```

## Parameters

- **notification**: A notification named [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/didMiniaturizeNotification].

## Discussion

You can retrieve the `NSWindow` object in question by sending [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotification/object] to `notification`.

## Minimizing Windows

- **windowWillMiniaturize(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the window is about to be minimized.
- **windowDidDeminiaturize(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the window has been deminimized.
